task: Build HarmonyEngine.ts to interpret 8-category attunement scores
description: Create a file named `HarmonyEngine.ts` inside `src/services/`. This module will analyze the normalized attunement scores and return insights for the user.

requirements.title: Input
details: Accept an object with 8 keys: mental, emotional, physical, spiritual, environmental, social, financial, creative
Each value is a number between 0â€“10

requirements.title: Output
details: { dominantCategory: 'emotional', weakestCategory: 'financial', insight: string, theme: string }

requirements.title: Logic
details: Identify dominant and weakest categories (highest and lowest scores)
Use simple rule-based logic to return a short 'insight' message per dominant category
Return a matching 'theme' string to drive dynamic theming later (e.g., 'light-mind', 'earth-heart')

requirements.title: Logging
details: Log the computed dominant and weakest categories

requirements.title: Error Handling
details: Gracefully handle missing or malformed input
Fallback to generic values if needed
